code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./DashboardCards.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SafetyPassport=()=>{const[searchBy,setSearchBy]=useState(columnHeaders[0]);const[searchText,setSearchText]=useState('');const handleSearchByChange=event=>{setSearchBy(event.target.value);};const handleSearchTextChange=event=>{setSearchText(event.target.value);};const columnHeaders=['Employee ID','Full Name','Company Name','Valid From','Valid Till','Employee Permit','Safety Training'];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"safetypassport-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"Safety-Passport-title",children:"Safety Passport"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:searchBy,onChange:handleSearchByChange,className:"search-by-dropdown",children:columnHeaders.map((header,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:header,children:header},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter text here",value:searchText,onChange:handleSearchTextChange,className:"search-input"})]});};export default SafetyPassport;
